rukus.text: 43|68|He mora bandasakala! Aji tomalokara kono bhaya na'i arau tomaloke cintita'o naha’ba.
43|69|Yisakale amara ayatara prati imana anichila arau te'omloka achila muchalima
43|70|tomaloka arau tomalokara straisakala anandacitte jannatata praraesa karaa.
43|71|Sonara thala arau panapatra lai te'omlokaka pradaksina karaa ha’ba, tata mane yi bicarae arau yitorae caku trpta haya se'i sakalo thakiba, arau tata tomaloke sthayi ha’ba.
43|72|E'itorae'i jannata, tomalokaka yitora adhikarai karaa haiche, tomalokara amalara phalasbaraupe.
43|73|Tata tomalokara babe ache pracura phalamula, tara paraa tomaloke khaba.
43|74|Niscaya aparaadhibilaka jahannamara sastita sthayi ha’ba
43|75|sihamtara sasti laghara karaa naha’ba arau sihamte tata hatasa hai paraiba.
43|76|Arau ami sihamtara prati an'yaya karaa nachilo, kintu sihamta nije'i achila yalima.
43|77|Sihamte ciyamrai ciyamrai ka’ba, ‘he malika! Tomara pratipalake yena amaka nihsesa karai diye’. Te'om ka’ba, ‘niscaya tomaloke enekaiye thakiba lagiba’.
43|78|Allahe ka’ba, ‘arasye ami tomalokara ocarata satya lai ahichilo, kintu tomalokara sarahabhage'i achila satya apachandakarai’.
43|79|Sihamte kono bisaye curanta sid'dhanta grahana karaiche neki? Niscaya amihe curanta sid'dhantakarai.
43|80|Athaba sihamte bhabe neki ye, ami sihamtara gopana bisaya arau mantrana sunibalai napa'om? Arasye sunibalai pa'om. Amara phiraistasakala sihamtara ocarate thaki likhe.
43|81|Koraa, ‘rahamanara yadi kono santana thakilehemtena tente maye'i prathama te'omra ibadatata ghrnakaraisakalara agrani ha’lohemtena
43|82|sihamte yi araopa karae tara paraa akasasamuha, prthiraira pratipalaka arau arachara raba ati paraitra-mahana.
43|83|Eteke tumi sihamtaka erai diya, sihamte magna thakaka behuda kathata arau khela-dhemalita matta thakaka, se'idinara sanmukhina nohoraa laike yito dinara pratisrauti sihamtaka diya haiche.
43|84|Teraemi satya ilaha akasata arau teraemi satya ilaha prthiraita. Te'om prajnamaya, sarbajna.

43|85|Arau te'om barakatamaya, yara kartrtbata ache akasasamuha, prthirai arau e'i duyora madhyararti sakalo bastu. Arau kiyamatara jnana kerala te'omra ocarate'i, arau te'omra ocarate'i tomalokaka pratyarartita karaa ha’ba.
43|86|Arau te'omra bahirae sihamte yiboraka ahbana karae, sihamte ketiya'o chuparaichara adhikarai naha’ba, kintu te'omlokara bahirae yisakale jani-suni satya saksya diye.
43|87|Arau yadi tumi sihamtaka sodha, ‘kone sihamtaka srsti karaiche’? Sihamte arasye ka’ba ‘allaha’. Tathapi'o sihamte kenekai bimukha haiche
43|88|arau te'omra (raachulara) e'i bani ye, ‘he mora raba! Niscaya ihamta enekuraa sampradaya yihamte imana posana nakaraiba’.
43|89|Eteke tumi sihamtaka upeksa karaa arau koraa, ‘chalama’. Kintu sihamte (iyara parainama) anatipalame janibalai paba.
